subject: Vam pro set
description_text:
Hello.

Is it possible to use your rumble kit on Heusinkveld Sprint pedals? If I
buy the Vam pro set with powersupply and the plus x pedal control box. Will
it work? ?

Thanks

//Robert

conversations.body_text: Hi Robert Rasch,  It is possible, but the mounting spacing of the bracket may not fit perfectly.Â
